code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Stats=[{count:"5K",label:"Active Students"},{count:"10+",label:"Mentors"},{count:"200+",label:"Courses"},{count:"50+",label:"Awards"}];const StatsComponenet=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-richblack-700",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-col gap-10 justify-between w-11/12 max-w-maxContent text-white mx-auto ",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 text-center",children:Stats.map((data,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col py-10",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-[30px] font-bold text-richblack-5",children:data.count}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"font-semibold text-[16px] text-richblack-500",children:data.label})]},index);})})})});};export default StatsComponenet;
